title: Mike Novogratz optimistic about Bitcoinâ€™s bright future
description: Mike Novogratz, a prominent figure in the crypto world, has expressed a bullish stance on the future of Bitcoin (BTC). This outlook comes in the wake of a debate on the potential impact of Grayscale’s decision regarding its exchange-traded fund (ETF) fees. Mike Novogratz counters bearish Bitcoin outlook after ETF decision The crypto community witnessed […]
